title: Why Socialism Sucks. An Interview with Dinesh D’Souza (Ep 1268)
description:
In this show I interview author Dinesh D’Souza about the growing threat of socialism in the United States. We discuss his new book “The United States of Socialism” available here: https://www.amazon.com/dp/1250163781/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_api_i_UDS2EbFJ40SGF
